original_text: And it came to pass, when Jabin king of Hazor had heard those things, that he sent to Jobab king of Madon, and to the king of Shimron, and to the king of Achshaph,
korean_text: 하솔 왕 야빈이 이 소식을 듣고 마돈 왕 요밥과 시므론 왕과 악삽 왕과

sentences.original_text: when Jabin king of Hazor had heard those things
sentences.korean_translation: 하솔 왕 야빈이 그 일들을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: that he sent to Jobab king of Madon
and to the king of Shimron
and to the king of Achshaph
